Learner.save_all[source]

Learner.save_all(path='export', dls_fname='dls', model_fname='model', learner_fname='learner')

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

load_learner_all[source]

load_learner_all(path='export', dls_fname='dls', model_fname='model', learner_fname='learner', cpu=True)

Recorder.plot_metrics[source]

Recorder.plot_metrics(nrows=None, ncols=None, figsize=None, imsize=3, add_vert=0, sharex=False, sharey=False, squeeze=True, subplot_kw=None, gridspec_kw=None)

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
dsid = 'OliveOil'
X_train, y_train, X_valid, y_valid = get_UCR_data(dsid, parent_dir='./data/UCR/', verbose=True, on_disk=True)
X = concat(X_train, X_valid)
y = concat(y_train, y_valid)
splits = (L(list(np.arange(len(X_train)))), L(list(np.arange(len(X_train), len(X)))))
tfms  = [None, [Categorize()]]
dsets = TSDatasets(X, y, tfms=tfms, splits=splits, inplace=True)
dls   = TSDataLoaders.from_dsets(dsets.train, dsets.valid, bs=[64, 128])
model = InceptionTime(dls.vars, dls.c)
learn = Learner(dls, model, metrics=accuracy)
learn.fit_one_cycle(1, lr_max=1e-3)

Dataset: OliveOil
X_train: (30, 1, 570)
y_train: (30,)
X_valid: (30, 1, 570)
y_valid: (30,)
epoch train_loss valid_loss accuracy time
0 1.683419 1.413022 0.133333 00:10
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
learn.save_all()
del learn
learn = load_learner_all()

Learner saved:
path          = 'export'
dls_fname     = 'dls'
model_fname   = 'model.pth'
learner_fname = 'learner.pkl'

learn.recorder.plot_metrics()
